body.p: Conceptually, TokenScripts treats ticket attestation as a Token. It does not matter if a Token exists on the blockchain as a ERC20 or ERC721 token, it is a token in TokenScript terms as long as it is usable as a Token. In this case, since the holder of ticket attestations can use it for web authentication as well as smart contract functions such as voting, for practical purpose it is a Token.
We will use Devcon ticket as an example and build a few websites around it:

ol.li: 3rd party website which recognise the attestation
3rd party website which authenticate the attestation's holder
Dapp website which allows the attestation to do some transactions
